title: Bell Centre
summary: The Centre Bell, formerly known as the Molson Centre (or Le Centre Molson), is a multi-purpose arena located in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. It opened on March 16, 1996, after nearly three years of construction. It is most notable as the home arena for the National Hockey League's Montreal Canadiens who are co-owned by the Molson Family. The Centre Bell is the largest hockey arena in the world.
